name: Tidal Defense
description:
This game was created Team Townie Global Game Jam 17.

Despite the warnings from local scientists, Mt. Parable the old iceberg situated to the North of town, has started to melt. The melting has caused tsunami waves to start heading towards the town. Alex the town engineer has decided to try to fortify the town barriers to keep everyone safe.

Can you succeed in saving the town or will everyone need to quickly evacuate?
